name: Defender (Mark Sibly)
overview: Protect the humanoids from invading landers. Landers will attempt to steal humanoids in order to mutate into dangerous mutants. When all 10 humanoids are lost, you must face the hazardous environment of hyperspace! Humanoids are replenished every 5 waves. Pods release deadly swarmers when destroyed. Bombers release mines which must be avoided. Briters appear if you take too long to complete an attack wave.
